title: Large 2Bed Townhome w private patio at Avalon Hayes Valley
posting_body: AVALON HAYES VALLEY
2 BEDROOM TOWNHOME 1.5 BATH
Starting from $5400
Lease terms include 13-24 months
Furnished short term leases also available
This modern townhome features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave, front loading W/D, private patio within a gated courtyard, large bedrooms, walk in closets.
Apartment 00E-139

We believe elevating where you live is about merging it seamlessly with how you live.
We have gone great distances to design amenities and choose locations that put everything within reach.
Where you live, is where you come alive.
In an area flourishing with convenience, recreation, culture and possibility, with a delicious array of cuisines at popular restaurants including Rich Table, Gary Danko, and Doppio Zero.
Here, you’ll also find easy access to a host of services from hospitals and hotels to schools and travel agencies in the vicinity.
Avalon Hayes Valley offers San Francisco apartments in Lower Haight.
Inside our refreshing smoke-free community, you'll find thoughtfully-designed studio, one- and two-bedroom apartments and townhomes.
Imagine entertaining in a gourmet kitchen and enjoying city views from large bay windows.
Our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, powered by Xfinity by Comcast, providing instant internet access for residents and guests.
Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a fitness center and beautifully landscaped rooftop terraces with outdoor seating and barbecues.
Not to mention you will be living in the heart of San Francisco near downtown, Civic Center, the Mission, SOMA and the Castro.
This is not just apartment living.
This is living up.
SAN FRANCISCO APARTMENT COMMUNITY
In addition to the many features and amenities, you will have guaranteed access to the Avalon Advantage.
This is a special program designed to benefit all our residents.
All routine maintenance is addressed AVALON HAYES VALLEY
SAN FRANCISCO APARTMENTS BY AVALON
Living at Avalon Hayes Valley will allow you to experience the thrill of the Bay Area in all its glory.
There is a wealth of attractions for you to explore in your free time.
Visit the Golden Gate Bridge or drive to Fisherman’s Wharf.
Alcatraz Island, Pier 39, and Union Square are amongst other famous hotspots in and around the city.
You can stroll leisurely through Mission District or Castro to discover a more realistic feel to SF.
Satisfy your hunger pangs within one business day of a resident's request to the management.
Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs.
If you're relocating or shifting cities, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many amazing communities.
Don't waste any more time!
